text: If you have your portal and their portal attached to your user just right click the theme and you can send it to another portal. Then re establish the theme styles if needed and insert content. Also. Make sure your links to partials and globals are relative not absolute.

Anybody know the constraints for section templates screenshotPath:?

I'm sure you can only use png's but sometimes my pngs dont work, other times they do. Seems there's file size or width/height limits.
